extendedIngredients.name: candy melts
extendedIngredients.original: 8 oz. (1 cup) dark chocolate candy melts
extendedIngredients.originalString: 8 oz. (1 cup) dark chocolate candy melts

title: Peppermint Bark
instructions: Line a baking sheet with waxed paper and place the cookie cutters on the waxed paper.In a microwave on high, melt the dark chocolate in a disposable decorating bag for 30 seconds. Knead the bag to work the chocolate. Continue melting the chocolate in 15-second increments until completely melted.Cut the tip off the decorating bag. Squeeze and spread the chocolate mixture into the cookie cutters; dividing evenly between the 6 cutters (about 1/3" thick). If necessary, tamp the cutter to help flatten and spread the chocolate.Place the baking sheet in the fridge until chocolate is cold and firm. About 10 minutes. Remove from the fridge.In the microwave, melt the peppermint candy melts using the same steps above.Squeeze and spread the peppermint chocolate over the top of the dark chocolate. Divide it evenly between the 6 cutters. If desired, sprinkle tops with crushed candy cane.Return to the fridge until both layers are firm. About 20 minutes.When set, remove the chocolate from the cookie cutters. Gift idea: Keep the chocolate in the cookie cutter, place it in a gift bag and tie off with a ribbon.

steps.step: Line a baking sheet with waxed paper and place the cookie cutters on the waxed paper.In a microwave on high, melt the dark chocolate in a disposable decorating bag for 30 seconds. Knead the bag to work the chocolate. Continue melting the chocolate in 15-second increments until completely melted.

Cut the tip off the decorating bag. Squeeze and spread the chocolate mixture into the cookie cutters; dividing evenly between the 6 cutters (about 1/3" thick). If necessary, tamp the cutter to help flatten and spread the chocolate.
Place the baking sheet in the fridge until chocolate is cold and firm. About 10 minutes.

Remove from the fridge.In the microwave, melt the peppermint candy melts using the same steps above.Squeeze and spread the peppermint chocolate over the top of the dark chocolate. Divide it evenly between the 6 cutters. If desired, sprinkle tops with crushed candy cane.Return to the fridge until both layers are firm. About 20 minutes.When set, remove the chocolate from the cookie cutters. Gift idea: Keep the chocolate in the cookie cutter, place it in a gift bag and tie off with a ribbon.
